content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the favorable location and the high standards I uphold, I aim to find a reasonable deal. However, for this well-situated 50 square meter apartment, my absolute limit would be 550 Euros per month. I'm hopeful we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low for the excellent location and size of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood but with my financial situation and other options, I cannot go beyond my proposed figure. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
